channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I wish Dad were here’: I received $500,000 after my late father’s wrongful-death lawsuit. My adviser suggests annuities. How do I invest it?
item.description: “I do not want incredibly high-risk investments. I want moderate risk, but something statistically stable.”

item.title: America Is Primed for a Home-Renovation Resurgence
item.description: Falling interest rates are expected to make it easier to pay for big home-improvement projects.

item.title: Citi has a new theory about the economy — and says investors should pick stocks that can stand on their own
item.description: Strategists at Citi like companies where there are positive trends on return on equity that are driven by operations instead of buybacks.

item.title: Private Markets Are Reserved for the Rich. Should a Test Let You in?
item.description: There is a debate over whether wealth or smarts determines who can invest in private markets.

item.title: Oil prices extend bounce from steep weekly loss as Middle East worries linger
item.description: Oil futures were on track for back-to-back gains, attempting to claw back steep losses suffered last week as fears of a broader Middle Eastern conflic...

item.title: U.S. Fixed-Income Assets Could Outperform in 2025
item.description: U.S. fixed income could outperform in 2025, as the Federal Reserve cuts rates, the economy weakens and inflation declines according to M&G Investments...

item.title: Dow Futures Fall Ahead of Earnings Flurry
item.description: Stock futures declined as the earnings bonanza continues.

item.title: My sisters want to hide $170,000 of our mother’s money from Medicaid by adding their names to her bank account. What should I do?
item.description: “The probate attorney says I could ask the court to remove sister No. 3 as co-executor, since she has acted unethically and illegally.”

item.title: ‘God works in mysterious ways’: I became a Nvidia millionaire playing ‘World of Warcraft.’ Am I smart — or just lucky?
item.description: “I had no job and no unemployment benefits.”

item.title: Europe's Gas Prices Boosted by Middle East Risks
item.description: European natural-gas prices edged higher in late morning trade, boosted by heightened geopolitical tensions and a colder weather forecast for November...
